ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Speaking of lower levels...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... 40 to 80 PP I paid 50 for both of mine... dont ask why two... lets just say i currently dont have one and have very bad luck... ... 100pp ... no clue ...
ygData.messageBody:
--- Talies the Wanderer <snicker@...> wrote:
> Speaking of lower levels, though - can I get an idea
> on costs/value of a
> few items, please (and please include your server,
> so we know about how old
> it is)
>
> Dragoon Dirk
40 to 80 PP
I paid 50 for both of mine... dont ask why two... lets
just say i currently dont have one and have very bad
luck...

> Shining Star of Light
100pp

> Avenger's Battleaxe
no clue

> Mistmoore Battledrums
1200-1500.. i bought mine for 1000, from someone i had
done business with before (he was selling for 1200 but
gave me a good deal)

> Banded armour (and what level should we upgrade >to
bronze)
NEVER!!!! just a personal opinion. Bronze is too heavy
and you can start on lambent in the low 20's. I wore
my reinforced leather pants till i got the lambent
ones at 25 (thanks to a 48th lvl friend taking me to
everfrost) I have still 3 peices of banded at 28.
Bronze is just way to heavy for the ac



=====
Harmonie Moonsong 28th Composition in Progress High Keep, Norrath, Bristlebane server http://www.geocities.com/harmoniemoonsong
